verses.verse: Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Tell <S%H1696><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to raise <S%H3947><s%> a contribution <S%H8641><s%> for Me; from every <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H376><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> moves <S%H5068><s%> him you shall raise <S%H3947><s%> My contribution. <S%H8641><s%>
"And this <S%H2088><s%> is the contribution <S%H8641><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you are to raise <S%H3947><s%> from them: gold, <S%H2091><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> and bronze, <S%H5178><s%>
blue, <S%H8504><s%> purple <S%H713><s%> and scarlet <S%H8144><s%> [material,] fine <S%H8336><s%> linen, <S%H8336><s%> goat <S%H5795><s%> [hair,]
rams' skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed <S%H119><s%> red, <S%H119><s%> porpoise <S%H8476><s%> skins, <S%H5785><s%> acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%>
oil <S%H8081><s%> for lighting, <S%H3974><s%> spices <S%H1314><s%> for the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> and for the fragrant <S%H5561><s%> incense, <S%H7004><s%>
onyx <S%H7718><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> and setting <S%H4394><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> for the ephod <S%H646><s%> and for the breastpiece. <S%H2833><s%>
"And let them construct <S%H6213><s%> a sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> for Me, that I may dwell <S%H7931><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them.

"According to all <S%H3605><s%> that I am going to show <S%H7200><s%> you, [as] the pattern <S%H8403><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> and the pattern <S%H8403><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> its furniture, <S%H3627><s%> just so <S%H3651><s%> you shall construct <S%H6213><s%> [it.]

"And they shall construct <S%H6213><s%> an ark <S%H727><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> two and a half <S%H2677><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long, <S%H753><s%> and one and a half <S%H2677><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> wide, <S%H7341><s%> and one and a half <S%H2677><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> high. <S%H6967><s%>

"And you shall overlay <S%H6823><s%> it with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> inside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> and out you shall overlay <S%H6823><s%> it, and you shall make <S%H6213><s%> a gold <S%H2091><s%> molding <S%H2213><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> it.

"And you shall cast <S%H3332><s%> four <S%H702><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> for it, and fasten <S%H5414><s%> them on its four <S%H702><s%> feet, <S%H6471><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> shall be on one <S%H259><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of it and two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> on the other <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of it.
"And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> poles <S%H905><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> and overlay <S%H6823><s%> them with gold. <S%H2091><s%>
"And you shall put <S%H935><s%> the poles <S%H905><s%> into the rings <S%H2885><s%> on the sides <S%H6763><s%> of the ark, <S%H727><s%> to carry <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> with them.
"The poles <S%H905><s%> shall remain <S%H1961><s%> in the rings <S%H2885><s%> of the ark; <S%H727><s%> they shall not be removed <S%H5493><s%> from it.
"And you shall put <S%H5414><s%> into the ark <S%H727><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I shall give <S%H5414><s%> you.

"And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> a mercy <S%H3727><s%> seat <S%H3727><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> two and a half <S%H2677><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long <S%H753><s%> and one and a half <S%H2677><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> wide. <S%H7341><s%>

"And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> cherubim <S%H3742><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> them of hammered <S%H4749><s%> work <S%H4749><s%> at the two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the mercy <S%H3727><s%> seat. <S%H3727><s%>

"And make <S%H6213><s%> one <S%H259><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%> at one <S%H2088><s%> end <S%H7098><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%> at the other <S%H259><s%> end; <S%H7098><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%> the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> [of one piece] with the mercy <S%H3727><s%> seat <S%H3727><s%> at its two <S%H8147><s%> ends. <S%H7098><s%>

"And the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> shall have <S%H1961><s%> [their] wings <S%H3671><s%> spread <S%H6566><s%> upward, <S%H4605><s%> covering <S%H5526><s%> the mercy <S%H3727><s%> seat <S%H3727><s%> with their wings <S%H3671><s%> and facing <S%H6440><s%> <S%H413><s%> one <S%H376><s%> another; <S%H251><s%> the faces <S%H6440><s%> of the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> are to be [turned] toward <S%H413><s%> the mercy <S%H3727><s%> seat. <S%H3727><s%>

"And you shall put <S%H5414><s%> the mercy <S%H3727><s%> seat <S%H3727><s%> on top <S%H4605><s%> of the ark, <S%H727><s%> and in the ark <S%H727><s%> you shall put <S%H5414><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I shall give <S%H5414><s%> to you.

"And there <S%H8033><s%> I will meet <S%H3259><s%> with you; and from above <S%H5921><s%> the mercy <S%H3727><s%> seat, <S%H3727><s%> from between <S%H996><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> cherubim <S%H3742><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are upon the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> I will speak <S%H1696><s%> to you about all <S%H3605><s%> that I will give <S%H6680><s%> you in commandment <S%H6680><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> a table <S%H7979><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long <S%H753><s%> and one cubit <S%H520><s%> wide <S%H7341><s%> and one and a half <S%H2677><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> high. <S%H6967><s%>
"And you shall overlay <S%H6823><s%> it with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> a gold <S%H2091><s%> border <S%H2213><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> it.

"And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> for it a rim <S%H4526><s%> of a handbreadth <S%H2948><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> [it;] and you shall make <S%H6213><s%> a gold <S%H2091><s%> border <S%H2213><s%> for the rim <S%H4526><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> it.

"And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> four <S%H702><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> for it and put <S%H5414><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> on the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H6285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are on its four <S%H702><s%> feet. <S%H7272><s%>
"The rings <S%H2885><s%> shall be close <S%H5980><s%> to the rim <S%H4526><s%> as holders <S%H1004><s%> for the poles <S%H905><s%> to carry <S%H5375><s%> the table. <S%H7979><s%>

"And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> the poles <S%H905><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> and overlay <S%H6823><s%> them with gold, <S%H2091><s%> so that with them the table <S%H7979><s%> may be carried. <S%H5375><s%>

"And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> its dishes <S%H7086><s%> and its pans <S%H3709><s%> and its jars <S%H7184><s%> and its bowls, <S%H4518><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> to pour <S%H5258><s%> libations; <S%H5258><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%> them of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold. <S%H2091><s%>
"And you shall set <S%H5414><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of the Presence <S%H6440><s%> on the table <S%H7979><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Me at all <S%H8548><s%> times. <S%H8548><s%>

"Then you shall make <S%H6213><s%> a lampstand <S%H4501><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold. <S%H2091><s%> The lampstand <S%H4501><s%> [and] its base <S%H3409><s%> and its shaft <S%H7070><s%> are to be made <S%H6213><s%> of hammered <S%H4749><s%> work; <S%H4749><s%> its cups, <S%H1375><s%> its bulbs <S%H3730><s%> and its flowers <S%H6525><s%> shall be [of one piece] with it.

"And six <S%H8337><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> shall go <S%H3318><s%> out from its sides; <S%H6654><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of the lampstand <S%H4501><s%> from its one <S%H259><s%> side, <S%H6654><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of the lampstand <S%H4501><s%> from its other <S%H8145><s%> side. <S%H6654><s%>

"Three <S%H7969><s%> cups <S%H1375><s%> [shall be] shaped <S%H8246><s%> like <S%H8246><s%> almond <S%H8246><s%> [blossoms] in the one <S%H259><s%> branch, <S%H7070><s%> a bulb <S%H3730><s%> and a flower, <S%H6525><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> cups <S%H1375><s%> shaped <S%H8246><s%> like <S%H8246><s%> almond <S%H8246><s%> [blossoms] in the other <S%H259><s%> branch, <S%H7070><s%> a bulb <S%H3730><s%> and a flower <S%H6525><s%> â€“ so <S%H3651><s%> for six <S%H8337><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> going <S%H3318><s%> out from the lampstand; <S%H4501><s%>
and in the lampstand <S%H4501><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cups <S%H1375><s%> shaped <S%H8246><s%> like <S%H8246><s%> almond <S%H8246><s%> [blossoms,] its bulbs <S%H3730><s%> and its flowers. <S%H6525><s%>

"And a bulb <S%H3730><s%> shall be under <S%H8478><s%> the [first] pair <S%H8147><s%> of branches <S%H7070><s%> [coming <S%H3318><s%>] out of it, and a bulb <S%H3730><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the [second] pair <S%H8147><s%> of branches <S%H7070><s%> [coming] out of it, and a bulb <S%H3730><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the [third] pair <S%H8147><s%> of branches <S%H7070><s%> [coming] out of it, for the six <S%H8337><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> coming out of the lampstand. <S%H4501><s%>

"Their bulbs <S%H3730><s%> and their branches <S%H7070><s%> [shall be of one <S%H259><s%> piece] with it; all <S%H3605><s%> of it shall be one piece of hammered <S%H4749><s%> work <S%H4749><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold. <S%H2091><s%>

"Then you shall make <S%H6213><s%> its lamps <S%H5216><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> [in number;] and they shall mount <S%H5927><s%> its lamps <S%H5216><s%> so as to shed <S%H215><s%> light <S%H215><s%> on the space <S%H5676><s%> in front <S%H6440><s%> of it.
"And its snuffers <S%H4457><s%> and their trays <S%H4289><s%> [shall be] of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold. <S%H2091><s%>
"It shall be made <S%H6213><s%> from a talent <S%H3603><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> utensils. <S%H3627><s%>
"And see <S%H7200><s%> that you make <S%H6213><s%> [them] after the pattern <S%H8403><s%> for them, which <S%H834><s%> was shown <S%H7200><s%> to you on the mountain. <S%H2022><s%>
